title: Gay - Dangerous (1983) [Bijou]
description:
Synopsis

Tearooms queens can now rejoice, as this classic early Falcon Studio film (released here by Bijou) is one of the sleaziest "anonymous sex" flicks ever. Sex in public footage, too.

3 Reasons To Buy This Film

* The bathroom stall self-suck is awesome.
* Directed by Steve Scott, it's one of his "essentials."
* Sleazy sleazy sleazy... and yummy yummy yummy.

Review

In what has become one of the most notorious "gloryhole" flicks ever, director Steve Scott's "Dangerous" is one to keep. The set-up is simple, as a young hunk finds himself drawn to the world of tricking in public - that is, he wants to suck it in public through an anonymous hole in the bathroom stall. I'm sure plenty of you can relate.

There are some plot developments (involving a couple) that are inconsequential, cuz this one's all about the sex. And the sex here is amazing. Deep-throatings through glory holes in the loo, dildo play, a self-suck-off in a stall that must be seen to gag on (that is, seen to believe) and a jack-off session in full view of the public that made my crotch swell.

Mostly blowjobs with a few anal bumpings tossed in (sans rubbers, of course), this thick-n-gooey cum-drenched classic is one to own... and could act as an instruction manual for "How to Be a Tearoom Queen 101". If you don't know what a tearoom, is ask your "uncle."
